Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor and Storage Analytics to continuously monitor the health and performance of Azure Blob Storage. Identify and investigate any anomalies or potential issues.
Verify the status and integrity of security measures, such as encryption at rest and in transit, access keys, and Shared Access Signatures (SAS). Rotate keys periodically as per security policies.
Review and update access control policies, including Azure RBAC roles and permissions, to ensure only authorized users and applications have access to Blob Storage.
Conduct audits of storage account configurations to ensure alignment with documented architecture and best practices for Azure Blob Storage.
Implement and verify regular backups of critical blob data using Azure Backup or other third-party solutions. Ensure backups are stored securely and are accessible for restoration.
Analyze performance metrics and optimize Blob Storage configurations, such as tiering (Hot, Cool, Archive) and caching, to ensure efficient storage operations.
Perform failover tests to verify that geo-redundant storage (GRS) or read-access geo-redundant storage (RA-GRS) configurations function correctly in case of primary region failures.
Review and update security policies, including firewall rules and virtual network configurations, to adapt to changes in the Blob Storage environment or security landscape.
Keep Azure Blob Storage service documentation up-to-date, including operational procedures, configuration details, and troubleshooting guides.
Perform regular compliance checks to ensure the Blob Storage setup adheres to relevant regulations and industry standards.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare the team for potential security incidents or Blob Storage outages. Ensure familiarity with procedures and protocols.
Evaluate the SLA performance of the Azure Blob Storage service. Address any issues or deviations from the agreed SLA metrics.
Develop and execute plans for Blob Storage upgrades or expansions as needed. Ensure minimal disruption during these activities.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new Blob Storage features, best practices, and security measures.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding Blob Storage performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
